Calculus.Differential

Class Derivative

  • java.lang.Object
    • Calculus.Differential.Derivative

  • public class Derivative
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to find the symbolic derivative of a function

      • fill_elementaries

        public java.util.HashSet fill_elementaries()
        Fills up a HashSet of type String with all of the known elementary functions to be used in parsing the expression
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all the known functions

      • derive

        public java.lang.String derive(java.lang.String function,
                      java.lang.String x,
                      java.lang.String y)
        Serves as an interface to retrieve the derivative of a given function with a given argument
        Parameters:
        function - The type of elementary function
        x - The only parameter of single argument functions
        y - Additional parameter for two argument functions
        Returns:
        A String representing the derivative

      • constant

        public java.lang.String constant(java.lang.String c)
        Computes the derivative of a constant c
        Parameters:
        c - The constant to differentiate
        Returns:
        A String containing a single zero

      • single

        public java.lang.String single(java.lang.String x)
        Computes the derivative of a single variable x
        Parameters:
        x - The variable x to differentiate
        Returns:
        A string containing a 1

      • power

        public java.lang.String power(java.lang.String base,
                     java.lang.String exponent)
        Calculates the derivative of a power function x^n
        Parameters:
        base - The base x
        exponent - The exponent n
        Returns:
        A String containing n(x)^(n-1)

        Parameters:

        exponent - The exponent x
        Returns:

                   java.lang.String x)
        Calculates the derivative of a logarithmic function with base a
        Parameters:
        base - The base of the logarithm
        x - The parameter x of the function log_a(x)
        Returns:
        The String containing 1/(x ln(a))

        Calculates the derivative of the secant function
        Parameters:
        x - The parameter x of the function sec(x)
        Returns:

        Calculates the derivative of the cotangent function
        Parameters:
        x - The parameter x of the function cot(x)
        Returns:

      • arcsin

        public java.lang.String arcsin(java.lang.String x)
        Calculates the derivative of the arcsine function
        Parameters:
        x - The parameter x of the function arcsin(x)
        Returns:
        The String 1/(1-x^(2))^(1/2)

      • arccos

        public java.lang.String arccos(java.lang.String x)
        Calculates the derivative of the arccosine function
        Parameters:
        x - The parameter of the function arccos(x)
        Returns:
        The String -1/(1+x^(2))^(1/2)

      • arctan

        public java.lang.String arctan(java.lang.String x)
        Calculates the derivative of the arctangent function
        Parameters:
        x - The parameter of the function arctan(x)
        Returns:
        The String 1/(1+x^(2))

      • sum

        public java.lang.String sum(java.lang.String f,
                   java.lang.String g)
        Calculates the derivative of a sum
        Parameters:
        f - The function f(x)
        g - The function g(x)
        Returns:
        d/dx(f + g) = d/dx(f) + d/dx(g)

      • difference

        public java.lang.String difference(java.lang.String f,
                          java.lang.String g)
        Calculates the derivative of a difference
        Parameters:
        f - The function f(x)
        g - The function g(x)
        Returns:
        d/dx(f - g) = d/dx(f) - d/dx(g)

      • product

        public java.lang.String product(java.lang.String f,
                       java.lang.String f_prime,
                       java.lang.String g,
                       java.lang.String g_prime)
        Calculates the derivative of a product
        Parameters:
        f - // The function f(x)
        f_prime - // The function f'(x)
        g - // The function g(x)
        g_prime - // The function g'(x)
        Returns:
        // d/dx(fg) = f(x)g'(x) + g(x)f'(x)

      • quotient

        public java.lang.String quotient(java.lang.String f,
                        java.lang.String f_prime,
                        java.lang.String g,
                        java.lang.String g_prime)
        Calculates the derivative of a quotient
        Parameters:
        f - // The function f(x)
        f_prime - // The function f'(x)
        g - // The function g(x)
        g_prime - // The function g'(x)
        Returns:
        // d/dx(f/g) = (g(x)f'(x) - f(x)g'(x))/(g(x))^(2)

      • get_argument

        public java.lang.String get_argument(java.lang.String f)
        Takes a function and retrieves it's argument within its parentheses
        Parameters:
        f - The function f(x)
        Returns:
        the argument x of f(x), May be another function entirely

      • is_elementary

        public boolean is_elementary(java.lang.String f)
        Determines whether a function is elementary or composite
        Parameters:
        f - The function f(x)
        Returns:
        True if the function is elementary, false if composite
